files.patch:
@@ -39,1 +39,0 @@
-                "-Xcomp",
@@ -42,0 +41,4 @@
+                // Prevent the dead branches to be compiled into an uncommon trap
+                // instead of generating a BlackholeNode.
+                "-XX:PerMethodTrapLimit=0",
+                "-XX:PerMethodSpecTrapLimit=0",
